title: Mods have reached a whole new low: suspended because my old threads violated the new rules.
body:
One thread I made that was around BEFORE the rule changes was removed and resulted in a forum suspension.

I don't know why, I assume there's a mod out there who just wants to get me off league.

It's one thing to just delete my old threads. It's another to take action against my account.

EDIT: I have deleted the Arianna Grande part of my post as it was explained as not contributing to my suspension.

> [{quoted}](name=Keyru,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=M9qdxWYh,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-07-30T18:35:16.473+0000)
>
> Hey Ser Safir,
> 
> The Ariana Grande discussion was deleted (messaging just stated that we changed our rules and these topics are not allowed anymore) due to it being bumped and starting a negative conversation.
> 
> I've been noticing that our messaging is unclear when handling necroed inappropriate threads and made adjustments for these specific circumstances. The messaging that should be received now when we delete OP's thread for necro should be:
> 
> As for the one where you received a suspension, this was a really poor mistake and I have escalated up to HurriKane to take to his team. Since you are unbanned now I cannot reduce it but I will be heavily discussing with the moderators to make sure that they look at the date of discussion prior to taking action.
